mapper.select: select ts.subjectId, ts.subjectNo, ts.subjectTitle, ts.subjectCredit, tts.subjectType, tts.trackId from tbl_subject as ts JOIN tbl_track_subject tts on ts.subjectId = tts.subjectId where trackId = #{trackINo};

select ts.subjectId, ts.subjectNo, ts.subjectTitle, ts.subjectCredit, tts.subjectType, tts.trackId from tbl_subject as ts JOIN tbl_track_subject tts on ts.subjectId = tts.subjec where trackId = #{trackId} and subtype = #{subtype}
